messages.message:
Hey, I’m looking to preview some changes to static assets (added/replaced some fonts (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67726) in `webserver/shared/src/py/static/fonts/`) in my crafting sandbox but I’m seeing 404s.
Is there something nginx/webapp-related I need to configure?

Also seeing the following when I try to `make clean build-docker RELOAD=1` on `webapp`
```fatal: cannot change to '/home/owner/instabase/webserver/webapp/build/instabase-docs': No such file or directory
Cloning into '/home/owner/instabase/webserver/webapp/build/instabase-docs'...
Fatal: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = invalid: repo type unsupported.
Fatal: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = invalid: repo type unsupported.
remote: Invalid username or password.
fatal: Authentication failed for 'https://github.com/instabase/instabase-docs.git/'
make: *** [Makefile:147: clone-instabase-docs] Error 128```

i agree you need to rebuild and restart webapp to test your changes

this thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1737652955642159) seems similar and could be helpful?

i don't think you need to rebuild/restart server-nginx in your crafting sandbox (this would be different in a deployed SaaS sandbox)

so maybe try Paul's suggestions from that thread first, and see if your changes are reflected?
Thanks! Unfortunately `workspace setup` also gets stuck on the same errors shown above…

so strange that there's a git auth error

you don't have a problem pulling/pushing for instabase's other git repos, right?
outside of rebuilding webapp, what happens if you try to clone https://github.com/instabase/instabase-docs in your sandbox?

Huh, well it seems I wasn’t considered logged in when I tried to clone!
But even after login I’m still seeing the same invalid username/password failure as before…

hmm that's quite strange

cc @Paul H in case you have any suggestions
i'm ssh-ing into your sandbox to take a look

you already went through https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TI/pages/2107736112/Setting+Up+Your+Crafting+Environment#Configuring-GitHub-Access when you first started using crafting sandboxes, right?
I think so but I don’t remember, it’s been while… I’ll double check all the steps
Yep my key’s still there & the CLI is working
Hmm maybe try creating a new sandbox using ibdev-backend? Maybe it’s an issue specific to this sandbox
Creating a new sandbox was pretty fast for me two weeks ago
Double checking: Are you cloning using ssh and not with https?
Oh wait, it’s part of a build command. Hmm

@Weiming Wu did you encounter this as part of your finangling last time?
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1737658510117649?thread_ts=1737652955.642159&cid=C05L87V014J
Oh I didn't run into that at all - my errors were related to my sandbox not having the right ssh keys to access the Instabase github repo
